name: V2_Ch7_ProtoDynamics_ChapterAxiom
intent: Define motion in semantic configuration space as governed by composite proto-forces.

domain.equation_of_motion: A = F_λ + F_ψ + F_μ + F_Σ + F_ρ

constraints.omega_stability: Motion must satisfy Ω-constraints for invariants.
constraints.truth_consistency: Π(X) invariant unless undergoing valid transition.
